venueSelection.title: Seleccione Su Establecimiento
venueSelection.subtitle: Explore nuestra colección de establecimientos y descubra sus menús
venueSelection.noVenues: No hay establecimientos disponibles en este momento

common.title: Menufic
common.translateInstructions: Use your browser's built-in translation feature to view this menu in your language:
common.translateChrome: Click the translate icon in the address bar, or right-click and select 'Translate to...'
common.translateSafari: Tap the aA button in the address bar, then select 'Translate to...'
common.translateFirefox: Right-click on the page and select 'Translate Page', or install the Firefox Translations add-on
